DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine SYMBICORT® deliver via pressurize metered-dose inhaler , refer pMDI , effective prevent COPD exacerbation .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison SYMBICORT® pMDI With Formoterol Turbuhaler® Subjects With COPD
DOC.criteria: A current clinical diagnosis COPD COPD symptoms 2 year Current smoker smoke history 10 pack year ( 1 pack year = 20 cigarette smoke per day one year ) A history least 1 COPD exacerbation require course steroid and/or antibiotic within 112 month first visit A history asthma 18 year age A history allergic rhinitis 18 year age Subjects take oral steroid Any significant disease disorder may jeopardize subject 's safety
